vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Zoba or Zobah = "station"
the name of a portion of Syria which formed a separate kingdom in the times of Saul, David, and Solomon; located northeast of Damascus
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑣巴 这个專有名詞 地名在原文的意思是 "哨站"
屬敘利亞的一部分, 在掃羅,大衛,和所羅門王時是一個獨立的王國;位於大馬士革附近
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
琐巴 这个专有名词 地名在原文的意思是 "哨站"
属叙利亚的一部分, 在扫罗,大卫,和所罗门王时是一个独立的王国;位于大马士革附近

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Another name of tso.va (צוֹבָא "Zobah" H6678)
§ Zoba or Zobah = "station"
the name of a portion of Syria which formed a separate kingdom in the times of Saul, David, and Solomon; located northeast of Damascus
